mapper.select: select id, car_num as carNum, branb, produce_time as produceTime, car_type as carType, guide_price as guidePrice from t_car
select id, car_num as carNum, branb, produce_time as produceTime, car_type as carType, guide_price as guidePrice from t_car where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update t_car set branb = #{branb} where id =#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_car (id, car_num, branb, produce_time, car_type, guide_price) values (null, "100", "小牛v999", "2020-11-04", "燃油车", "50")
insert into t_car (id,car_num, branb, produce_time, car_type, guide_price) values (null,#{car_num}, #{branb}, #{produce_time}, #{car_type}, #{guide_price})
insert into t_car (id,car_num, branb, produce_time, car_type, guide_price) values (null,#{carNum}, #{branb}, #{produceTime}, #{carType}, #{guidePrice})
